content.rendered:
VULCAN Lifestyle| VINNO

Project: Vulcan Lifestyle
Location: Banglamotor, Dhaka, Bangladesh
Architect: Nazirul Asif , Wasik Edaaf , Mahpar Aatthar
Project by: VINNO
Photography by Prantography / Junaid Hasan Pranto

©Prantography

Do not use or publish these photographs without any prior permission.
Thank you!

A brand like Vulcan needed a dynamic approach. A global retail concept based on the idea of speed, dynamism and out of the box attitude that can act as a habitat for their world class products. Carefully chosen materials and their solid-void playfulness caters perfect need of display and storage. The threshold to enter is a very narrow staircase, giving the buyers to experience a sudden change of space.
